      • Movie

        public Movie(java.lang.String name,
             Coordinates coor,
             long oscarsCount,
             java.lang.Long totalBoxOffice,
             MovieGenre genre,
             MpaaRating rating,
             Person screenwriter,
             java.time.LocalDate creationDate)
      throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
             java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Constructor for loading from files (include creation date)
        Parameters:
        name - movie name, can't be empty or null
        coor - movie coordinates, can't be null
        oscarsCount - oscars quantity, need to be upper than zero
        totalBoxOffice - total box office, can't be null, need to be upper than zero
        genre - film genre (can be null)
        rating - film mpaa rating (can be null)
        screenwriter - film screenwriter (can be null)
        creationDate - creation date
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if got null object
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
